document_data.name: White Pack
document_data.mainbody: The '''White Pack''' was a pack of [[good]]-aligned, [[Selûne|Selûnite]] [[werewolves]] that served under the network of altruistic beasts known as the [[Fangshields]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were distinguished by gray and white fur while in their bestial form.
document_data.Members: This group of lupine [[lycanthrope]]s were led by the alpha female [[Brena Whitebrow]]. She had been grooming her son, [[Brenvol Whitebrow|Brenvol]] to take over as the pack's leader following her time as leader.
